price: Tidakkah mereka mengetahui berapa banyak umat-umat sebelum mereka yang telah Kami binasakan. Orang-orang (yang telah Kami binasakan) itu tidak ada yang kembali kepada mereka.720)
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ
footnotes: *720) Mereka itu tidak kembali ke dunia.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alam yaraw kam ahlaknā qablahum mina al-qurūni annahum ilayhim lā yarjiʿūna
